title: Is that Scarlett Johansson's ass?
body: Yes. Yes it is. After picking up our new digital projector, I was ultra pumped to try it out. The first "official" test was my DVD of Bjork videos... Pagan Poetry to be exact. If you've seen the video, you know why I chose it. Since Bjork's videos were 4:3 ratio, the next test was to see how well a widescreen DVD would look. I decided to use Lost in Translation, but don't ass me why. Here's a shot of me measuring Bill Murray's ego. Here's what the blog looks like at seven feet six inches across. I immediately queued up some internet porn after Nicole put the camera away. Here I am teaching Bogey the fine art of shadow puppetry. I'm demonstrating the famous "man leaning towards wall" puppet, while Bogey strains his tail to get it into the light. "Damnit," Bogey says. "Will my tail ever be long enough?"
author: Dan

comments.author: justin
comments.body: You still going to have the projector around the house this weekend? I hope so!

comments.author: Nate
comments.body: Do not mock Sofia C.'s masterpiece!  DO NOT!!!!  (I am quite firm on this point).  Don't make me get all jet lag ennui on ya.

comments.author: Nate
comments.body: When dogs do shadow puppetry with their paws, do they make People Heads?

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: can you project video games on that thing? CAN YOU???

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: The answer to all the questions posed above is "yes."

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body:
very nice
if you need someone to come over and test playing counterstrike on it.. just let me know

comments.author: Nicki J
comments.body:
Wow. pardon me whilst I drool all over myself imagining video games that large.

Ok. I'm better now.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: I played MVP 2004 with the projector. It totaled whipped my ass.

comments.body:
"Since Bjork's videos were 4:3 ratio, the next test was to see how well a widescreen DVD would look. I decided to use Lost in Translation, but don't ass me why. " 

did you realize that you typed "but dont ASS me why", because i was thinking it would work better as ASK, but you know what ever.

comments.author: Evan Erwin
comments.body:
You're new around here, aren't you?

Any reason to see Ms. Johansen's rear is a good reason, I assure.
